name: Udio
description: Udio is an AI-powered music creation tool that allows users to generate any song imaginable simply by describing it in text. It caters to both professional musicians and amateurs, offering features for ideation, generation of stems, and AI-powered audio editing. Users can export creations to a DAW or upload their own audio.

features: Basic features

pros: Create personalized music for any occasion
Express musical ideas through text descriptions
Tool for both professionals and amateurs
Vibrant community of creators and music lovers
cons: Browser does not support video tag for all media.
targetAudience: Musicians, Songwriters, Music Producers, Music Enthusiasts
useCases: Generating music for specific moods or events

name: Suno
description: Suno is an AI-powered music creation tool that allows users to generate songs from text prompts. It offers features for both beginners and experienced musicians, enabling the creation of high-quality music with various styles and instruments. Users can start with simple prompts or use advanced editing tools, upload audio, rewrite lyrics, and export stems for use in DAWs.
